sundayMobileOST.title: Your Guide to Positioning Sunday Mobile's Value Against T-Mobile

content.section: Own the Conversation: Your Guide to Positioning Sunday Mobile's Value Against T-Mobiles New Plans
content.text: T-Mobile is making noise with their latest plans launching today, April 23 - but when you break it down, Sunday Mobile delivers where it counts and T-Mobile has a track record of breaking their promises when it matters most. We pulled together the top questions and how to answer them so you can stay sharp, position Sunday Mobile clearly, and close with confidence.

content.question: T-Mobile says their plans are cheaper for families. Why should I pay more for Sunday Mobile?
content.answer: That is not often the case. T-Mobiles new plans actually raise the price of the total bill since taxes and fees are no longer included. Unlike T-Mobile, at Sunday Mobile you can mix and match so you can customize plans for everyone in the family & only pay for what you want. Plus with Sunday Mobile's Best Value Guarantee, new and existing customers get a 3-year price lock guarantee on mySundayPlan and mySundayHome, a new phone for free on every plan in mySundayPlan and the most ways to save by bundling mobile + home, perks and free satellite messaging.

content.question: But T-Mobile says they guarantee a 5-year price lock on their plans and Sunday Mobile has a 3-year price lock.
content.answer: Lets talk about it. T-Mobiles 5-year price lock sounds interesting, but do not be fooled by their marketing. T-Mobile used to tout a price lock for life and are now being sued because they ended up raising prices on those plans. They say this time is different, but now they are also charging customers for taxes and fees, which used to be included - ultimately paying more to get their new price lock guarantee. At Sunday Mobile, we extended a three year price guarantee to new and existing customers, with no price-increase and no action needed. That is the Sunday Mobile Best Value Guarantee.

content.text: Sunday Mobile just gives you more: mix and match plans, faster hotspot and international speeds on mySundayPlan, free satellite messaging on every plan. T-Mobile locks you in - but with no mix and match, no satellite unless you pay more, and they stopped including taxes and fees in their new price lock. So if current customers switch to these plans, their total bill will go up!

content.question: T-Mobile says they all let me upgrade my phone every year. Does Sunday Mobile do that?
content.answer: T-Mobile builds that into their most expensive plan ($100 for 1 line!) but here is the thing: as part of our Sunday Mobile Best Value Guarantee, today, both new and existing customers can get a new phone for free on every plan in mySundayPlan. If you are like most, you are holding onto your phone a little longer - with the average being around 40 months. When you have got your phone paid off, you can upgrade and get a new one when you trade in your phone. At Sunday Mobile, we do not tier the value of your trade - we take any phone, any condition - from Apple, Google or Samsung, and you get the maximum offer value for your plan.

content.question: I am seeing a lot of T-Mobile ads saying they are the best in 5G. Is that true?
content.answer: Lets stick to the facts. Sunday Mobile is Americas largest network. And according to Root Metrics, Sunday Mobile has the fastest and most reliable 5G network.

content.question: How does Sunday Mobile's offer stack up against T-Mobiles offers?
content.answer: In addition to the Sunday Mobile Best Value Guarantee, we are offering the best deals we have ever had! You can trade in any phone and get four iPhone 16 Pros on us with Sunday Mobile Ultimate that is up to $4,000 in savings. We have deals for every customer and offer savings you cannot get anywhere else. New customers can score incredible deals on our Unlimited plans, including four lines with Sunday Mobile Welcome for $25/line. New customers can also get up to $800 to pay off their phone when they switch to Sunday Mobile.

content.question: I heard T-Mobiles new plan gives you free Netflix, Hulu, and Apple TV+. Does Sunday Mobile offer that?
content.answer: Yeah, T-Mobile includes those in their most expensive, account level plans but Sunday Mobile is different. Even our entry level Sunday Mobile Welcome plan offers savings on streaming services like Netflix & Max. T-Mobile will only give you one subscription per account even if you have five lines on their most expensive plan. With Sunday Mobile, you can customize each line to a plan that meets your needs so you only pay for what you want.

content.question: What about satellite messaging?
content.answer: Unlike T-Mobile, Sunday Mobile offers free satellite messaging for all customers on any plan guaranteed.

content.question: I travel a lot internationally T-Mobile gives 15GB of data abroad. What about Sunday Mobile?
content.answer: Sunday Mobile's Sunday Mobile Ultimate includes international talk, text, and 15GB of high-speed data per month in over 210 countries. The big difference - once you have used your high speed data allotment, Sunday Mobile offers data speeds 6x faster than what T-Mobile offers.

content.question: T-Mobile says they give you 250 GB of hotspot data that is a ton. What does Sunday Mobile give?
content.answer: Sunday Mobile gives you unlimited hotspot - or 200 GB - with Sunday Mobile Ultimate — which is more than enough for most people. The key difference? After 200GB, Sunday Mobile customers can enjoy speeds of 6Mbps - enough to still stream a video, listen to music or browse the web. T-Mobile offers 600Kbps speeds once you use your allotment, which is practically unusable. Plus, our hotspot actually works where and when you need it, and that makes all the difference when you are tethering on the go.

content.question: So can you sum this all up? Why Sunday Mobile over T-Mobile?
content.answer: Why Sunday Mobile? We offer Americas largest network. Everyone - new & existing customers - get savings you will not get anywhere else. And we are here for you 24 x 7. With Sunday Mobile's Best Value Guarantee, new and existing customers get a 3-year price lock guarantee on mySundayPlan and mySundayHome, a new phone for free on every plan in mySundayPlan and the most ways to save by bundling mobile + home, perks and free satellite messaging. Sunday Mobile gives you long term value - not just a long-term price commitment.

sundayMobileValueProposition.title: Introducing the Sunday Mobile Best Value Guarantee

introduction.headline: On 4.3, Sunday Mobile continues to build trust and value with—The Sunday Mobile Best Value Guarantee.
introduction.description: With this industry-first commitment, Sunday Mobile is bringing unparalleled value and peace of mind to both new and existing customers.
introduction.valueStatement: Value they can’t get anywhere else.

guarantees.title: Guaranteed Prices

newOffers.details: 3-year price lock guarantee with any mySundayPlan
Up to 5-year price lock guarantee with mySundayHome

explanation: Sunday Mobile is the first and only carrier offering new and existing customers a 3-year(Statring from 04/03/2025) price lock guarantee on all mySundayPlan and up to 5 years on my Sunday Home network plans. *
guarantees.exclusions: *Excludes perks, discounts and offers, taxes, fees, transactional or 1-time charges and any equipment charges; restarts if price plan is changed up or down to another mySundayPlan tier

notes.detail: Get 1 additional year added to their current Price Lock Guarantee. No action needed (resulting in 3, 4, or 5 years depending on original plan).
Not applicable to existing customers who signed up for a mySundayHome plan with the Fast Start 2025 5-year price guarantee (does not increase from 5 to 6 years).

systemUpdateNote.title: IMPORTANT SYSTEM UPDATE NOTE
details: The extended price guarantee for existing mySundayHome customers will NOT be visible in Account System. System visibility will be updated on April 17th.
Customers checking their account via My Sunday Mobile Online or the My Sunday Mobile App will only see their original price guarantee duration during this time.
Account System will also not reflect the updated duration during this period.

guarantees.title: Guaranteed Trade-in
guarantees.offer: Existing customers on *any* mySundayPlan can *always* get the same great phone deals as a new customer when they trade-in *any* phone, *any* condition.
explanation: This means: Everyone, new AND existing, can get a free phone on any mySundayPlan (with qualifying trade-in).

guarantees.title: Guaranteed Savings
guarantees.summary: With every mySundayPlan customers get access to incredible value they can’t get anywhere else - 40% off top streaming services like Netflix & Max, $15/mo off home internet.
guarantees.newFeature: All plans now include free satellite messaging.
guarantees.explanationTitle: This means: There are so many ways to save on Sunday Mobile!

savingsBreakdown.description: mySundayPlan and mySundayHome customers can save over 40% on five of the most popular subscription services.
Customers save additional $15/mo when they have both mySundayPlan and mySundayHome—and get a perk on us with our best internet plans.
Save big on their Sunday Mobile bill and earn major rewards with the Sunday Mobile Visa Card and the new Sunday Mobile + Openbank Savings offer.
Sunday Mobile is the first in the industry to guarantee free satellite text messaging on qualifying devices on all mySundayPlan tiers.

quickPitch.title: Quick Pitch
quickPitch.description: Here’s a quick pitch you can use to spark up the conversation with customers—this is a HUGE deal (literally), so make sure every customer hears about it!
quickPitch.pitch: Sunday Mobile guarantees the price of your plan wont increase for the next 3 years on mySundayPlan and up to 5 years on mySundayHome! And now, existing customers always get the same great phone deals as new customers. Plus, there is always new ways to save, like 40% off top streaming services or free satellite text messaging. Only with Sunday Mobile.
